勑字的基本解释

勑
chì
同“敕”。

勑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《集韻》蓄力切，入職，徹。］
同“敕1”。
(1)整饬。
(2)诫饬；告诫。
(3)自上命下之词。特指皇帝的诏书。
(4)命令。
[②]［lài］
［《廣韻》洛代切，去代，來。］
慰劳，劝勉。

勑字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页148第07
【唐韻】落代切【集韻】【正韻】洛代切，?音萊。【說文】勞也。【廣韻】同徠。又【集韻】蓄力切，音敕。誡也。【易·噬嗑】先王以明罰勑法。又【正韻】誡也，正也，固也。又通作敕。【後漢·馬援傳】效伯高不得，猶爲謹敕之士。又【正韻】天子制書曰勑。【集韻】或作勅飭。

勑
Basic explanation of words
勑
chì
Same as "Emperor".
勑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Jiyun" is full of strength, entry, thoroughness. ]
Same as "Imperial 1".
(1) Rectification.
(2) Commandments; warnings.
(3) Words from the top to the bottom. Especially refers to the edict of the emperor.
(4) Command.
[②]［lài］
["Guangyun" Luo Daiqie, go to generation, come. ]
Consolation and exhortation.
勑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　勑; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 148 to 07
[Tang Yun] Luo Daiqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Luo Daiqie,? Yin Lai. [Said Wen] Lao Ye. [Guang Yun] Same as Lai. Also 【Jiyun】Gather power and cut, sound edict. Commandments too. 【Easy · Biting】The first Wang Yiming's method of punishment. [Zhengyun] The commandment is also, and is solid. Also pass as an edict. [Later Han·Ma Yuan Biography] I can't take the role of Bo Gao, and I'm still a gentleman. Also [Zhengyun] The emperor made a book called 勑. [Ji Yun] or as an emperor.
勑
